Text: Is it real, dude? I mean of course you are a VIP uploader. But the movie just got out at 3rd May. How is it possible to have a DVDRip so quickly?
It is more of a DVD Screener. Check the sample and screens.
Iron Man 3 will be released on Blu-ray and DVD on the 27th of August. 2013.  This is the worst news in the history of bad news!!!!!

For the first 15-20 it was telling me that the download would take weeks but I waited to see if it would change and it dropped down to about 4 hours so if it does this to you guys be patient, will post about quality when it finishes :)
Why is that release date bad news? This was by far the worst in the Iron Man series. On another note this does not look like a DVD screener rip...looks like a pretty good cam

I will DL it and post my comments shortly with what this is exactly, but I doubt it is what the title describes it as.
A10 V10. Fuck Yeah. Finally

Okay it is an HDcam version and not a DVDrip. However I will give the audio 6 and video 7. The only reason I give it these, are because I do not like Camrips.. HD or not! I do not care how much they cleaned it up. The video is still pretty dark in a lot of scenes, but this is the best Camrip out on TPB. The audio is a bit low! Again I would appreciate it if you guys label the torrents correctly. I do not care if you got them offline from some place else and they labeled it wrong. If you personally watch this and you would have known it is a camrip. I will still give you credit for uploading a somewhat good camrip, but to warn the people is only fair. NOT DVDrip!!!!!!! It is and HDcam rip only. I gave my ratings in this description. Sorry if it low for some of you, I just do not like Camrips and also being mislead....
same as R6, hd cam.

R6 does not mean HD Cam! It means it came from region 6 China! Camera sources should be broken down into two groups PAL and NTSC! An R6 line would mean it came from a DVD source from China. BlueRay etc.etc.. This should be labeled Camrip and it should not have DVDrip, Scr. or anything to do with R5 R6 (lines) in the title. It should read Camrip or HD camrip and the title of the movie. Nothing more should be included.
